verses.verse: And Yitz'chak <S%H3327><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>, and blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8762><s%> him, and charged <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8762><s%> him, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, Thou shalt not take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> of the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Kanahan <S%H3667><s%>.

Arise <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%> to Padanaram <S%H6307><s%>, to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Bethuel <S%H1328><s%> thy mother's <S%H517><s%> father <S%H1><s%>; and take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thee a wife <S%H802><s%> from thence of the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Laban <S%H3837><s%> thy mother's <S%H517><s%> brother <S%H251><s%>.

And 'Elohim <S%H410><s%> Almighty <S%H7706><s%> bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8762><s%> thee, and make thee fruitful <S%H6509><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, and multiply <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thee, that thou mayest be a multitude <S%H6951><s%> of people <S%H5971><s%>;

And give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee the b'rakhah <S%H1293><s%> of Avraham <S%H85><s%>, to thee, and to thy seed <S%H2233><s%> with thee; that thou mayest inherit <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> wherein thou art a stranger <S%H4033><s%>, which 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto Avraham <S%H85><s%>.

And Yitz'chak <S%H3327><s%> sent away <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>: and he went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to Padanaram <S%H6307><s%> unto Laban <S%H3837><s%>, son <S%H1121><s%> of Bethuel <S%H1328><s%> the Syrian <S%H761><s%>, the brother <S%H251><s%> of Rebekah <S%H7259><s%>, Ya`akov's <S%H3290><s%> and Esav's <S%H6215><s%> mother <S%H517><s%>.

When Esav <S%H6215><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that Yitz'chak <S%H3327><s%> had blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8765><s%> Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>, and sent him away <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8765><s%> to Padanaram <S%H6307><s%>, to take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8800><s%> him a wife <S%H802><s%> from thence; and that as he blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8763><s%> him he gave him a charge <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8762><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Thou shalt not take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> of the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Kanahan <S%H3667><s%>;
And that Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> obeyed <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> and his mother <S%H517><s%>, and was gone <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to Padanaram <S%H6307><s%>;

And Esav <S%H6215><s%> seeing <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Kanahan <S%H3667><s%> pleased <S%H5869><s%> not <S%H7451><s%> Yitz'chak <S%H3327><s%> his father <S%H1><s%>;

Then went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Esav <S%H6215><s%> unto Yishma`el <S%H3458><s%>, and took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the wives <S%H802><s%> which he had Mahalath <S%H4258><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Yishma`el <S%H3458><s%> Avraham's <S%H85><s%> son <S%H1121><s%>, the sister <S%H269><s%> of Nebajoth <S%H5032><s%>, to be his wife <S%H802><s%>.
And Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from Be'er-Sheva <S%H884><s%>, and went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> toward Haran <S%H2771><s%>.

And he lighted <S%H6293><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon a certain place <S%H4725><s%>, and tarried there all night <S%H3885><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, because the sun <S%H8121><s%> was set <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%>; and he took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of the stones <S%H68><s%> of that place <S%H4725><s%>, and put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them for his pillows <S%H4763><s%>, and lay down <S%H7901><s%> in that place <S%H4725><s%> to sleep <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And he dreamed <S%H2492><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and behold a ladder <S%H5551><s%> set up <S%H5324><s%> <S%H8716><s%> on the earth <S%H776><s%>, and the top of it <S%H7218><s%> reached <S%H5060><s%> <S%H8688><s%> to heaven <S%H8064><s%>: and behold the angels <S%H4397><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> ascending <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8802><s%> and descending <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8802><s%> on it.

And, behold, the YY <S%H3068><s%> stood <S%H5324><s%> <S%H8737><s%> above it, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, I am the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Avraham <S%H85><s%> thy father <S%H1><s%>, and the 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Yitz'chak <S%H3327><s%>: the land <S%H776><s%> whereon thou liest <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, to thee will I give it <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and to thy seed <S%H2233><s%>;

And thy seed <S%H2233><s%> shall be as the dust <S%H6083><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, and thou shalt spread abroad <S%H6555><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to the west <S%H3220><s%>, and to the east <S%H6924><s%>, and to the north <S%H6828><s%>, and to the south <S%H5045><s%>: and in thee and in thy seed <S%H2233><s%> shall all the families <S%H4940><s%> of the earth <S%H127><s%> be blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8738><s%>.

And, behold, I am with thee, and will keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee in all places whither <S%H834><s%> thou goest <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and will bring thee again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8689><s%> into this land <S%H127><s%>; for I will not leave <S%H5800><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee, until <S%H834><s%> I have done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that which I have spoken <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> to thee of.

And Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> awaked <S%H3364><s%> <S%H8799><s%> out of his sleep <S%H8142><s%>, and he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Surely <S%H403><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> is <S%H3426><s%> in this place <S%H4725><s%>; and I knew <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it not.

And he was afraid <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, How dreadful <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8737><s%> is this place <S%H4725><s%> ! this is none other but the house <S%H1004><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and this is the gate <S%H8179><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%>.

And Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> rose up early <S%H7925><s%> <S%H8686><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>, and took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the stone <S%H68><s%> that he had put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8804><s%> for his pillows <S%H4763><s%>, and set it up <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> for a pillar <S%H4676><s%>, and poured <S%H3332><s%> <S%H8799><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> upon the top of it <S%H7218><s%>.

And he called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of that place <S%H4725><s%> Beit-El <S%H1008><s%>: but <S%H199><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of that city <S%H5892><s%> was called Luz <S%H3870><s%> at the first <S%H7223><s%>.

And Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> vowed <S%H5087><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a vow <S%H5088><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, If 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> will be with me, and will keep me <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in this way <S%H1870><s%> that I go <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and will give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me bread <S%H3899><s%> to eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, and raiment <S%H899><s%> to put on <S%H3847><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,
So that I come again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to my father's <S%H1><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> in peace <S%H7965><s%>; then shall the YY <S%H3068><s%> be my 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>:

And this stone <S%H68><s%>, which I have set <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8804><s%> for a pillar <S%H4676><s%>, shall be 'Elohim's <S%H430><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>: and of all that thou shalt give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> me I will surely <S%H6237><s%> <S%H8763><s%> give the tenth <S%H6237><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto thee.
